name: 2th World Congress on Materials Science and Engineering
content: Welcome to the 12th World Congress on Materials Science and Engineering..! MATCON-2025 Heart warmly welcomes all members from all over the world to participate in the 12th World Congress on Materials Science and Engineering. This year's event will take place in the magnificent city of Barcelona, Spain, from June 23 to 24, 2025\. The main theme: Research and Developments in the Field of Materials Sciences And Engineering.
